Posts.Content: We did have the nuelasta shot via the tricep travel pac. It sure looked like it worked. We’ll know more Wednesday when we redo the blood count. She sure feels good today.
Posts.Title: WBC count at zero

Posts.Content: First round of chemo for stage 2A breast cancer went pretty well. However blood work just one week after showed zero on white blood cell count. Next chemo is next Thursday as long as WBC count comes back. Any suggestions. Diet is excellent and we are being extremely careful about cleanliness. On an antibiotic as well for 5 days.
Posts.Title: WBC count at zero
